content.description: The following relative frequency table shows the political party affiliation for a sample of 500 people in a certain town.
content.question: Political Party Relative Frequency Democrat 0.35 Republican 0.30 Independent 0.20 Green Party 0.11 Libertarian 0.03 Other 0.01 Which of the following statements is supported by the table?

choices.label: The number of people affiliated with the Republicans is 30.
The number of people affiliated with the Independents is 100.
Less than half of the people are affiliated with the Democrats or the Republicans.
At least 200 people are affiliated with the Democrats.
At least 80 people are affiliated with the Green Party or the Libertarians.

content.answer: The number of people affiliated with the Independents is 100.

topic.text: 1.3: Representing a Categorical Variable with Tables

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
